context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

parent.description: Limit result set to those of particular parent IDs.

parent_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those of a particular parent ID.

slug.description: Limit result set to products with a specific slug.

status.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status.

type.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific type.

sku.description: Limit result set to products with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

featured.description: Limit result set to featured products.

category.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category ID.

tag.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag ID.

shipping_class.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific shipping class ID.

attribute.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute. Use the taxonomy name/attribute slug.

attribute_term.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute term ID (required an assigned attribute).

on_sale.description: Limit result set to products on sale.

min_price.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price.

max_price.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximum price.

stock_status.description: Limit result set to products with specified stock status.

date_created.description: The date the product was created, in the site's timezone.

date_created_gmt.description: The date the product was created, as GMT.

date_on_sale_from.description: Start date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

date_on_sale_from_gmt.description: Start date of sale price, as GMT.

date_on_sale_to.description: End date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

date_on_sale_to_gmt.description: End date of sale price, in the site's timezone.

download_limit.description: Number of times downloadable files can be downloaded after purchase.

download_expiry.description: Number of days until access to downloadable files expires.

external_url.description: Product external URL. Only for external products.

button_text.description: Product external button text. Only for external products.

stock_status.description: Controls the stock status of the product.

backorders.description: If managing stock, this controls if backorders are allowed.

sold_individually.description: Allow one item to be bought in a single order.

purchase_note.description: Optional note to send the customer after purchase.

date_created.description: The date the image was created, in the site's timezone.

date_created_gmt.description: The date the image was created, as GMT.

date_modified.description: The date the image was last modified, in the site's timezone.

date_modified_gmt.description: The date the image was last modified, as GMT.

visible.description: Define if the attribute is visible on the "Additional information" tab in the product's page.

variation.description: Define if the attribute can be used as variation.

options.description: List of available term names of the attribute.

menu_order.description: Menu order, used to custom sort products.
